attributes.action: Private organisations should take financial responsibility for their actions
attributes.additional_details:
We want the government to enforce rules of financial responsibility on corporations operating in the uk. The penalty fir failing to be responsible is the corporation be banned from operating in the uk until all debts are settled.
Financial responsibility should include:
Payment of taxes.
Abiding by laws concerning corruption
And siezure of assets from corporations that have received state aid but are refusing repayment.
